00018 #define EMPTY_CACHE_ENTRY           65000
00019 
00020 UINT32 guiCacheSize           = MIN_CACHE_SIZE;
00021 
00022 void DetermineOptimumAnimationCacheSize( )
00023 {
00024       // If we have lots-a memory, adjust accordingly!
00025       guiCacheSize = MIN_CACHE_SIZE;
00026 }
00027 
00028 BOOLEAN InitAnimationCache( UINT16 usSoldierID, AnimationSurfaceCacheType *pAnimCache )
00029 {
00030       UINT32 cnt;
00031 
00032       // Allocate entries
00033       AnimDebugMsg( String( "*** Initializing anim cache surface for soldier %d", usSoldierID ) );
00034       pAnimCache->usCachedSurfaces = (UINT16 *) MemAlloc( sizeof( UINT16 ) * guiCacheSize );
00035       CHECKF( pAnimCache->usCachedSurfaces!= NULL );
00036 
00037       AnimDebugMsg( String( "*** Initializing anim cache hit counter for soldier %d", usSoldierID ) );
00038       pAnimCache->sCacheHits = (INT16 *) MemAlloc( sizeof( UINT16) * guiCacheSize );
00039       CHECKF( pAnimCache->sCacheHits!= NULL );
00040 
00041       // Zero entries
00042       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < guiCacheSize; cnt++ )
00043       {
00044             pAnimCache->usCachedSurfaces[ cnt ] = EMPTY_CACHE_ENTRY;
00045             pAnimCache->sCacheHits[ cnt ] = 0;
00046       }
00047       pAnimCache->ubCacheSize = 0;
00048 
00049       // Zero surface databse history for this soldeir
00050       ClearAnimationSurfacesUsageHistory( usSoldierID );
00051 
00052       return( TRUE );
00053 }
00054 
00055 void DeleteAnimationCache( UINT16 usSoldierID, AnimationSurfaceCacheType *pAnimCache )
00056 {
00057       // Allocate entries
00058       if ( pAnimCache->usCachedSurfaces!= NULL )
00059       {
00060             AnimDebugMsg( String( "*** Removing Anim Cache surface for soldier %d", usSoldierID ) );
00061             MemFree( pAnimCache->usCachedSurfaces );
00062       }
00063 
00064       if ( pAnimCache->sCacheHits != NULL )
00065       {
00066             AnimDebugMsg( String( "*** Removing Anim Cache hit counter for soldier %d", usSoldierID ) );
00067             MemFree( pAnimCache->sCacheHits );
00068       }
00069 }

00072 BOOLEAN GetCachedAnimationSurface( UINT16 usSoldierID, AnimationSurfaceCacheType *pAnimCache, UINT16 usSurfaceIndex, UINT16 usCurrentAnimation )
00073 {
00074       UINT8             cnt;
00075       UINT8             ubLowestIndex = 0;
00076       INT16         sMostHits = (INT16)32000;
00077       UINT16            usCurrentAnimSurface;
00078 
00079       // Check to see if surface exists already
00080       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < pAnimCache->ubCacheSize; cnt++ )
00081       {
00082             if ( pAnimCache->usCachedSurfaces[ cnt ] == usSurfaceIndex )
00083             {
00084                    // Found surface, return
00085                    AnimDebugMsg( String( "Anim Cache: Hit %d ( Soldier %d )", usSurfaceIndex, usSoldierID ) );
00086                    pAnimCache->sCacheHits[cnt]++;
00087                    return( TRUE );
00088             }
00089       }
00090 
00091       // Check if max size has been reached
00092       if ( pAnimCache->ubCacheSize == guiCacheSize )
00093       {
00094             AnimDebugMsg( String( "Anim Cache: Determining Bump Candidate ( Soldier %d )", usSoldierID ) );
00095 
00096             // Determine exisiting surface used by merc
00097             usCurrentAnimSurface = DetermineSoldierAnimationSurface( MercPtrs[ usSoldierID ], usCurrentAnimation );
00098             // If the surface we are going to bump is our existing animation, reject it as a candidate
00099 
00100             // If we get here, we need to remove an animation, pick the best one
00101             // Loop through and pick one with lowest cache hits
00102             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < pAnimCache->ubCacheSize; cnt++ )
00103             {
00104                    AnimDebugMsg( String( "Anim Cache: Slot %d Hits %d ( Soldier %d )", cnt, pAnimCache->sCacheHits[ cnt ], usSoldierID ) );
00105 
00106                    if ( pAnimCache->usCachedSurfaces[ cnt ] == usCurrentAnimSurface )
00107                    {
00108                         AnimDebugMsg( String( "Anim Cache: REJECTING Slot %d EXISTING ANIM SURFACE ( Soldier %d )", cnt, usSoldierID ) );
00109                    }
00110                    else
00111                    {
00112                          if ( pAnimCache->sCacheHits[ cnt ] < sMostHits )
00113                          {
00114                                     sMostHits = pAnimCache->sCacheHits[ cnt ];
00115                                     ubLowestIndex = cnt;
00116                          }
00117                    }
00118             }
00119 
00120             // Bump off lowest index
00121             AnimDebugMsg( String( "Anim Cache: Bumping %d ( Soldier %d )", ubLowestIndex, usSoldierID ) );
00122             UnLoadAnimationSurface( usSoldierID, pAnimCache->usCachedSurfaces[ ubLowestIndex ] );
00123 
00124             // Decrement
00125             pAnimCache->sCacheHits[ ubLowestIndex ] = 0;
00126             pAnimCache->usCachedSurfaces[ ubLowestIndex ] = EMPTY_CACHE_ENTRY;
00127             pAnimCache->ubCacheSize--;
00128 
00129       }
00130 
00131       // If here, Insert at an empty slot
00132       // Find an empty slot
00133       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < guiCacheSize; cnt++ )
00134       {
00135             if ( pAnimCache->usCachedSurfaces[ cnt ] == EMPTY_CACHE_ENTRY )
00136             {
00137                   AnimDebugMsg( String( "Anim Cache: Loading Surface %d ( Soldier %d )", usSurfaceIndex, usSoldierID ) );
00138 
00139                   // Insert here
00140                   CHECKF( LoadAnimationSurface( usSoldierID, usSurfaceIndex, usCurrentAnimation ) != FALSE );
00141                   pAnimCache->sCacheHits[ cnt ] = 0;
00142                   pAnimCache->usCachedSurfaces[ cnt ] = usSurfaceIndex;
00143                   pAnimCache->ubCacheSize++;
00144 
00145                   break;
00146             }
00147       }
00148 
00149       return( TRUE );
00150       }
00151

00153 
00154 void UnLoadCachedAnimationSurfaces( UINT16 usSoldierID, AnimationSurfaceCacheType *pAnimCache )
00155 {
00156       UINT8             cnt;
00157 
00158       // Check to see if surface exists already
00159       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < pAnimCache->ubCacheSize; cnt++ )
00160       {
00161             if ( pAnimCache->usCachedSurfaces[ cnt ] != EMPTY_CACHE_ENTRY )
00162             {
00163                   UnLoadAnimationSurface( usSoldierID, pAnimCache->usCachedSurfaces[ cnt ] );
00164             }
00165       }
00166 
00167 }
